docs.snippet: Spurred by the momentum the issue has gained in the United States, Parliament is examining a tightening of the rules governing the response to sports-related concussions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Spurred by the momentum the issue has gained in the United States, Parliament is examining a tightening of the rules governing the response to sports-related concussions.
docs.abstract: British Parliament has started campaign to highlight incidence of serious head injuries in sports, spurred by momentum issue has gained in United States; concerns about concussions and their link to neurological conditions have focused on rugby, country’s most popular contact sport and, increasingly, on professional soccer.

headline.main: British Lawmakers Intensify Focus on Head Injuries
headline.print_headline: British Lawmakers Intensify Focus on Head Injuries

docs.snippet: At a school fair at the Department of Probation in the Bronx, officers made sure that clients on probation were on the right path....
docs.lead_paragraph: At a school fair at the Department of Probation in the Bronx, officers made sure that clients on probation were on the right path.
docs.abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York describes scene at a school fair at the Department of Probation in the Bronx; event is first of several planned by city's probation commissioner, Vincent N Schiraldi, that aim to formally connect younger people on probation with school or vocational trading.

headline.main: Nagging, as a Force for Good
